BioMAJ cron service¶

biomaj-cron API reference¶

class biomaj_cron.cron.CronClient(endpoint=None)¶

Client class to manage BioMAJ cron service, either locally or calling remote service

cron_task_add(cron_time, banks, cron_name, cron_oldname=None)¶

Add a new cron task

Parameters:
  • cron_time (str) – cron format time request (example: 0 * * 1 *)
  • banks (str) – banks to update (example alu,genbank)
  • cron_name (str) – unique name for the cron operation, used to match a cron task
  • cron_oldname (str) – unique name for an existing cron operation in case of cron task update, defaults to cron_name parameter
Returns:

bool Success of operation
cron_task_remove(cron_name)¶

Removes a cron task

Parameters:cron_name (str) – unique name for the cron operation, used to match a cron task
Returns:bool Success of operation
cron_tasks()¶

Get a list of defined cron tasks

Returns:list of str (cron syntax like format * * * * * echo hello), None if operation failed
